GOBI 2025

Dec 21, 2025 · Renaissance Beijing Haidian Hotel | 北京中关村东升科技园万丽酒店

Unlock the Source, Create the Future | 释放源力，创造未来

Open source is a digital public good. GOBI connects developers, businesses, and policy partners to turn open collaboration into sustainable innovation and growth—from source to scale.

Register Now
Submit Talk / Demo

在这里，商业的本质被重新定义：不再是依附体系，而是赢得社群。你将掌握AI时代的创作与协作方法，链接你的"1000个铁杆支持者"，构建属于自己的"新美第奇效应"，让热爱本身成为你最坚实的资产。

Sustainable

Governance, funding, and long-term incentives for open source as a digital public good

Measurable

Framework for community health and business conversion metrics (measurement methods and tools)

Actionable

Insights from LF COSSA's 'Commercial Open-Source White Paper' with localized practices

Policy Guidance

Interpretation of national-level investment in open source and industrial transformation

Local Challenges

Real difficulties and solution paths for open source business in China

Immediate Participation

Training camp学员 Lightning Talks with real-time audience and jury voting

Focused Tracks

Product design in the AI era | AI product globalization | Open source business roundtable

Key Highlights

GOBI 2025 focuses on core open source business topics

Agenda

09:00 - 10:00

Registration & Social Breakfast

10:00 - 10:15

Opening Remarks: GOBI 2025 & Upstream Training Camp Review

10:15 - 10:45

Keynote 1: Open Source Industry Development Overview

10:45 - 11:05

Keynote 2: Exploring Open Source Business Models (Theory and Practice)

11:05 - 11:25

Keynote 3: Sustainable Open Source Business Ecosystem Index (Theoretical Framework)

11:25 - 12:25

Panel Discussion: Source Power Awakening: Open Source Business in the AI Era

12:30 - 13:30

Lunch & Training Camp Lightning Talks

3-4 minutes each; Real-time audience + jury voting

13:30 - 14:30

Panel Discussion: Breakthrough · Individual Survival Rules in the AI Era

14:30 - 15:30

Panel Discussion: Gather Strength · Evolution and Future of Open Source Communities

15:30 - 16:00

Coffee Break & Demo Walk

15:30 - 16:30

Panel Discussion: Creation · AI-Driven New Renaissance

16:30 - 17:00

Upstream Open Source Business Innovation Project Showcase and Voting

17:00 - 17:10

Awards: Upstream Open Source Business Innovation Awards

17:10 - 17:30

Closing: From Source to Industry, 2026 Outlook

18:00 - 20:00

Dinner & Happy Hour

Guest / Attendee Networking

Schedule is subject to change

Venue

Renaissance Beijing Haidian Hotel

Building 6, Yard 8, North Street, Dongsheng Science Park, Haidian District, Beijing

Located in the core area of Zhongguancun, Renaissance Beijing Haidian Hotel features modern conference facilities and comfortable accommodation environment, adjacent to many well-known technology companies and universities, with convenient transportation.

Track Descriptions

Three specialized tracks focusing on different areas

A | Product Design in the AI Era

Edge/hybrid inference experience, agents/workflows, usability and security, PLG growth

B | Globalizing AI Products

Pricing and billing, regional compliance, localization, channels and ecosystem partners

C | Open Source Business Panel

Business models (Open Core, SaaS, dual licensing, enterprise support), sales and delivery, SBOM and compliance

Target Speaker Profiles

Experts and practitioners from different fields

Internet and Cloud Providers

AI infrastructure, developer platforms, AIGC/Agent ecosystem leaders

Leading Open Source Projects and Maintainers

Models/frameworks/databases/data platforms

AI Developer Tools

Inference and training frameworks, monitoring and evaluation, DevEx toolchains

Industry and Investment

Enterprise open source leaders, industry research, investment firm partners

Policy and Standards

Foundations/associations, compliance and standards organizations

Registration and Partnerships

Multiple ways to participate

Early Bird Tickets

Enjoy discounted pricing by booking early

Student Tickets

Special discounts for students

Group Tickets

Discounts for groups of three or more

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Chinese venue provided, simultaneous interpretation/English subtitles as needed

  • Live streaming and recordings of breakout sessions planned (sent via email after registration)

  • Corporate reimbursement and student discount policies

  • Community booths and Demo Walk sessions provided

  • Scan QR code on site, one vote per person, real-time display

Join GOBI 2025

Open source is a digital public good. GOBI 2025 connects developers, businesses, and policy partners to explore sustainable paths from "source" to "industry".

If you are an open source project founder/maintainer, developer/PM/designer, investment and industry partner, policy and standards organization, or campus community member, you are welcome to participate in GOBI 2025.
